description: A suspect is in custody in France after three people were killed at Nice's Notre-Dame basilica.
title: France attack: Pictures from the scene of deadly stabbings in Nice
title_page: France attack: Pictures from the scene of deadly stabbings in Nice - BBC News
maintext: This is not the first time that Nice has experienced a terror attack. In 2016, 86 people were killed when a man drove a truck into crowds of people celebrating Bastille Day.
